mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS usage_count , SUM(use_time) AS usage_minute , SUM(use_distance) AS usage_meter , round(SUM(use_distance)/1000*0.232, 1) AS carbon_reduction FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt}

SELECT S.USE_NO AS USE_NO , S.USE_DISTANCE AS USE_DISTANCE , S.USE_TIME AS USE_TIME , date_format(S.USE_START_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %h:%i') AS USE_START_DT , date_format(S.USE_END_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %h:%i') AS USE_END_DT , P.PAY_DATETIME AS PAY_DATETIME , MAX(CASE WHEN P.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'C' THEN P.PAY_COST END) AS CARD_PAY , MAX(CASE WHEN P.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'P' THEN P.PAY_COST END) AS POINT_PAY FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use as S JOIN kickboard_svc.t_svc_use_pay as P ON S.USE_NO = P.USE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt} GROUP BY USE_NO ORDER BY USE_START_DT DESC
